job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description:
Responsibilities

  • Substantial day-to-day coding, performing profiling, optimizing, and general troubleshooting.
  • Engage in technical planning, design, and code reviews.
  • Participate with other engineers to help plan the company’s long-term engineering roadmap and help identify improvement areas.

Qualifications

  • A bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, electrical engineering, or related field.
  • Fluency in one or more general purposes programming languages including but not limited to: Java, C/C++, C#, Python, Objective-C.
  • 3+ years of programming experience.
  • Strong passion for programming.
  • Solid and creative problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.


Benefits:

Dental insurance, flexible schedule, health insurance, paid time off, referral program, vision insurance, life insurance


Job location:

3120 139th Avenue Southeast

Suite 500

Bellevue, WA 98005
